label: Rotary Knob
desc: A small module contain a rotary know UI component.

label: Shake Detector
desc: A small module to detect a device shake with the accelerometer.

label: Carousel Scroll
desc: A module with components to build carousell scroll user interfaces.

label: Media Query
desc: Contains a handy component to create responsive interfaces.

label: Multi Select
desc: This module contains a few components that will help you make multi select drop downs.

label: Checkbox group
desc: This module contains a few components that will help you make checkbox groups.

label: Mapbox
desc: Use this module to add maps and location visualisations to your app.

label: Google Analytics
desc: Track user behavior with Google Analytics.

label: Google Sheets
desc: Use your google sheets as a data source for your applications.

label: GraphQL
desc: A module to help quering data using GraphQL.

label: QR Scanner
desc: This module contains node for scanning QR codes from camera or images.

label: Custom HTML
desc: Write your own HTML and pass values to it with template strings. Useful for embeds.

label: Form Validation
desc: This module adds a utility node that makes different kind of form validation easier.

label: i18next Translation
desc: A module for using i18next in Noodl.

label: Lottie
desc: A module for using Lottie in Noodl.

label: Markdown
desc: Use Markdown in Noodl and style it with CSS.

label: MQTT Module
desc: This module contains nodes for sending and receiving messages over MQTT in web apps.

label: Web Camera
desc: Support for accessing the camera in web apps.
